name.en: Special Topics in Space Science I

department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程會讓學生有機會執行指導老師的高空動力實驗室（UADL）研究相關的專題研究。研究題目包含小型人造衛星及酬載開發與作業工作、高層大氣與太空物理、以及有限的行星大氣科學題目。學生會從中接觸到跨領域研究與系統整合。
goal.en: The purpose of this class is to provider the student with hands on experience in performing tasks related to the Instructor‘s Upper Air Dynamics Lab (UADL) research group. Research topics include development and operational work on small satellites and scientific payloads, upper atmospheric and space physics. Limited work on developing capacity on planetary atmospheres is also being performed. Interdisciplinary research and systems integration will be highlighted.

outline.ch: 專題生將參加 UADL 實驗室每週的實驗室會議提供進度報告以及相關討論。專題生同時可與團隊上更資深的組員互動，並了解自己的專題跟實驗室的任務與發展計畫之間的關聯。
outline.en: Students are expected to participate in weekly lab meetings to provide progress updates, as well as discussions related to developmental problem solving. Students will also be able to use this as an oppertunity to interact with more experienced members of the UADL team to exchange lessons learned, while also learning how their projects fit into the larger missions and projects of the lab.

textbook.en: To be assigned based on topic.
